html:
Role Voice type Premiere cast
Moscow, 7 January 1898
(Conductor: Eugenio Esposito) 		Premiere cast
St. Petersburg, 26 January 1901
(Conductor: Eduard Nápravník)
Foma Nazarich, doyen, elder of Novgorod tenor
Luka Zinovich, governor, elder of Novgorod bass
Sadko, gusli-player and singer in Novgorod tenor
Lyubava Buslayevna, his young wife mezzo-soprano
Nezhata, young gusli-player from Kiev contralto
Duda, skomorokh bass
Sopel, skomorokh tenor
The Varangian, overseas guest bass
The Indian, overseas guest tenor
The Venetian, overseas guest baritone
Ocean-Sea, the Sea King bass
Volkhova, the beautiful princess; his youngest, favorite daughter soprano
The Apparition, a mythic mighty warrior in the guise of a pilgrim baritone
Chorus, silent roles: Merchants of Novgorod, wandering minstrels, sailors, maidens, inhabitants of the undersea kingdom, people
